Target managment¶

This functions are used to save a particular target to restore that later.

Note

target save is based on names, so will work good only with unique names, such as unique NPC (including rare and boss mobs) and players.

Save¶

To save target

/mi tsave

Restore¶

To restore target

/mi trestore

Set custom target¶

To save a custom target name

/mi tcustom <name>

HINT: you can use this if you’re searching for a rare mob, save his <name> and then use /mi restore to target him.
